select e.first_name||' '||e.last_name as employeeName, e.user_domain as userDomain, (select count(1) from employee_role where role_id='BOM' and user_domain=e.user_domain) as statusBOM, (select count(1) from employee_role where role_id='HBU' and user_domain=e.user_domain) as statusHBU, (select count(1) from employee_role where role_id='HDE' and user_domain=e.user_domain) as statusHDE, (select count(1) from employee_role where role_id='SPV' and user_domain=e.user_domain) as statusSPV, (select count(1) from employee_role where role_id='ADM' and user_domain=e.user_domain) as statusADM, (select count(1) from employee_role where role_id='EMP' and user_domain=e.user_domain) as statusEMP from employees e where e.user_domain=#userDomain#
